meanings.definition: (comparative of slutty) More promiscuous or sexually provocative.
meanings.sent1: She wore a sluttier outfit to the party than usual.
meanings.sent2: Her behavior became sluttier as the night went on.
meanings.sent3: The movie character's sluttier actions led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent4: The neon lights made the city look even sluttier at night.
meanings.sent5: The singer's sluttier image shocked her fans.
meanings.sent6: Despite her friends' warnings, she continued to dress sluttier each day.

meanings.definition: (comparative of slutty) More messy or untidy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The sluttier room was in need of a good cleaning.
meanings.sent2: His desk looked even sluttier after the papers fell off.
meanings.sent3: The sluttier kitchen made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent4: The sluttier garden was full of overgrown weeds.
meanings.sent5: The sluttier closet was a jumble of clothes and shoes.
meanings.sent6: The sluttier appearance of the house surprised the guests.
